words.source: H559 ('amar, waw-consecutive Qal wayyiqtol 3ms) 'to say'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'And He said'
H408 ('al, negative particle of prohibition) 'do not'; KJV 'Draw not', ESV 'Do not', NASB 'Do not'
H7126 (qarab, Qal jussive 2ms) 'to come near/approach'; KJV 'nigh hither', ESV 'come near', NASB 'come near'
H5394 (shal, Qal imperative 2ms) 'to take off/remove (sandals)'; KJV 'put off', ESV 'take off', NASB 'remove'
H5275 (na'al, noun common fp construct + 2ms suffix) 'sandals/shoes'; KJV 'thy shoes', ESV 'your sandals', NASB 'your sandals'
H5921 ('al, preposition with preposition min) 'from upon/off of'; KJV 'off', ESV 'from', NASB 'from'
H7272 (regel, noun common fd construct + 2ms suffix) 'feet'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'your feet'
H4725 (maqom, noun common ms absolute with definite article) 'place'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'the place'
H834 ('asher, relative particle) 'which/where'; KJV 'whereon', ESV 'on which', NASB 'on which'
H5975 ('amad, Qal active participle ms absolute) 'to stand'; KJV 'standest', ESV 'are standing', NASB 'are standing'
H5921 ('al, preposition + 3ms suffix) 'on it/upon it'; KJV 'on', ESV/NASB 'on'
H127 ('adamah, noun common fs construct) 'ground/soil'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'ground'
H6944 (qodesh, noun common ms absolute) 'holiness/sacredness'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'holy'
H1931 (hu', personal pronoun 3ms) 'it/he'; KJV 'is', ESV/NASB 'is' (implied copula)
